outputs.output_descr: The main functions of each centre will be: i) analyze and follow up the local governance conditions for MDG achievement, ii) publicize information and provide scenarios for citizens debate, iii) identify strategic areas of intervention and facilitate dialogue among sub national governments and other local actors, and iv) provide feedback to a regional node on the tools and methodologies used. The regional node will articulate the local centers, and will promote partnerships to establish the local centers, create synergies among them and with other relevant development actors and initiatives within and outside the UN System, further develop common knowledge tools on local governance for the MDGs, and monitor the activities carried out by local centers.

project_title: Regional Project on Local Governance in LAC
